title: Mixed Matrix Completion in Complex Survey Sampling under Heterogeneous Missingness
abstract: Modern surveys with large sample sizes and growing mixed-type questionnaires require robust and scalable analysis methods. In this work, we consider recovering a mixed dataframe matrix, obtained by complex survey sampling, with entries following different canonical exponential distributions and subject to heterogeneous missingness. To tackle this challenging task, we propose a two-stage procedure: in the first stage, we model the entry-wise missing mechanism by logistic regression, and in the second stage, we complete the target parameter matrix by maximizing a weighted log-likelihood with a low-rank constraint. We propose a fast and scalable estimation algorithm that achieves sublinear convergence, and the upper bound for the estimation error of the proposed method is rigorously derived. Experimental results support our theoretical claims, and the proposed estimator shows its merits compared to other existing methods. The proposed method is applied to analyze the National Health and N

translated_title: 在异质缺失下的复杂抽样混合矩阵补全
translated_abstract: 现代具有大样本量和不断增长的混合类型问卷的调查需要稳健且可扩展的分析方法。在这项工作中，我们考虑通过复杂的抽样方式获得的混合数据框矩阵恢复问题，其中条目遵循不同的指数分布并受到异质缺失的影响。为了解决这个具有挑战性的任务，我们提出了一个两阶段的方法：在第一阶段，我们使用逻辑回归对条目级缺失机制进行建模；在第二阶段，我们通过最大化带有低秩约束的加权对数似然来完成目标参数矩阵的补全。我们提出了一个快速且可扩展的估计算法，它实现了次线性收敛，并严格推导了所提方法的估计误差上界。实验结果支持我们的理论结果，并且所提出的估计器在与其他现有方法的比较中展现了其优点。该方法被应用于对国家健康与...
tldr: 本论文针对现代大样本和混合类型问卷调查的特点，提出了一个在异质缺失情况下恢复复杂抽样混合矩阵的方法，通过两阶段的过程，利用逻辑回归建模缺失机制并最大化加权对数似然以实现矩阵补全。实验结果表明该方法具有优越性能。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a method for recovering a complex survey mixed matrix under heterogeneous missingness, by modeling the missing mechanism and maximizing a weighted log-likelihood. Experimental results demonstrate its superior performance.
